content: this is my very first design of socks these socks have sweet wavy edge on the cuff and hand dyed yarn are used on the foot if you have some beautiful hand dyed yarn in the stash these socks can be a good try these socks are worked from cuff down starting from the wavy edge on cuff then working on the ribs on leg after working heel flat and picking up gusset stitches foot is worked in the round in the end graft the toe closed to finish enjoy knitting
